Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY CvSU Mission Tanza Campus Phase 2 Pabahay 2000 Bagtas Tanza Cavite Cavite State University shall provide  (046) 414-3979 excellent, equitable and relevant www.cvsu.edu.ph educational opportunities in the arts, sciences and technology through quality instruction and responsive research and OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES developmental activities. It shall produce professional, skilled and PLAN OF ACTIVITIES morally upright individuals for global Second Semester AY, 2020-2021 competitiveness.
DATE ACTIVITY TIME AND VENUE PARTICIPANTS MODALITY Start of admission Guidance March 1, 2021 for incoming first CvSU Admission Coordinator/OSAS Online/Offline year (1st Sem S.Y System Coordinator 2021-2022) April 12-17, 2021 Midterm Examination Virtual Pre- employment CvSU-Main Campus Students, Faculty Online April 28, 2021 Webinar and Job Facebook Page and Staff Fair Virtual Culture and 1:00-4:00 PM via Students and April 28-29, 2021 Arts Festival Facebook Live Faculty Online Webinar on 1:00-4:00 PM via Students and April 29-30, 2021 Entrepreneurship Facebook Live Faculty Online Mental Health 1:00-4:00 PM via Students, Faculty May 21, 2021 Webinar Facebook Live and Staff Orientation on Scholarship and CvSU-Main Campus Online May 22, 2021 Students Financial Facebook Page Assistance Webinar on June 3, 2021 Managing Students 1:00-4:00 PM via Faculty and Online Facebook Live Students with Special Needs Webinar on Risk Online June 9, 2021 Reduction 1:00-4:00 PM via Faculty, Students Facebook Live and Staff Management June 14-19, 2021 Final Examination
Prepared by: Noted:
MELONA I. SAQUIN NOEL A. SEDIGO OSAS Coordinator Campus Administrator Date prepared: September 19, 2020

Republic of the Philippines
CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY
Tanza Campus Phase 2 Pabahay 2000 Bagtas Tanza Cavite  (046) 414-3979
www.cvsu.edu.ph
OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES
ACCOMPLISHMENT REPORT Second Semester AY, 2020-2021
TARGET ACTUAL ACCOMPLISHMENT REMARKS DATE ACTIVITY TIME AND VENUE
Start of admission Evaluated admission requirements of 944 applicants March 1, 2021 for incoming first CvSU Admission System for the first year S.Y 2021-2022. year (1st Sem S.Y Accomplished 2021-2022) 673 applicants qualified the evaluation.
Virtual Pre- Endorsed 1 Virtual Pre-employment Webinar to employment CvSU-Main Campus graduating students on April 28, 2021 conducted by April 28, 2021 Accomplished Webinar and Job Facebook Page CvSU-Main Campus via Facebook live Fair Virtual Culture 1:00-4:00 PM via Facebook Conducted Virtual Culture and Arts Festival on April 28- April 28-29, 2021 Accomplished and Arts Festival Live 29, 2021 via Facebook live. Conducted an entrepreneurship webinar entitled Webinar on 1:00-4:00 PM via Facebook Bookeeping and Financial Management for Small and April 29-30, 2021 Accomplished Entrepreneurship Live Medium Enterprise (SME) Owners on April 29-30, 2021. Conducted a mental health webinar entitled: Reaching, Mental Health 1:00-4:00 PM via Facebook May 21, 2021 Supporting and Empowering Students and Faculty Accomplished Webinar Live Members During Pandemic on May 21, 2021. Endorsed a re-orientation webinar about RA 10931 Orientation on CvSU-Main Campus May 22, 2021 Universal Access to Quality Education Act conducted Accomplished Scholarship and Facebook Page by OSAS-Main on May 21, 2021.

Cavite at the Cavite Provincial Gymnasium, Trece Martires City, Cavite on August 19, 2022.
